head.citation-title: Some applications of a decomposition for five quaternion matrices in control system and color image processing
head.abstracts: © 2021, SBMAC - Sociedade Brasileira de Matemática Aplicada e Computacional.In this paper, some applications of a decomposition for five quaternion matrices in control system and color image processing are given. A system of Sylvester-type quaternion matrix equations with five equations is considered. Some necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of a solution to the system is derived. The general solution to the system is presented. The maximal and minimal ranks of the general solution to the system is provided. New frameworks for simultaneous embedding and extraction of five watermarks through this decomposition is proposed. Some algorithms and examples are given to illustrate the main result.

coredata.dc:description: In this paper, some applications of a decomposition for five quaternion matrices in control system and color image processing are given. A system of Sylvester-type quaternion matrix equations with five equations is considered. Some necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of a solution to the system is derived. The general solution to the system is presented. The maximal and minimal ranks of the general solution to the system is provided. New frameworks for simultaneous embedding and extraction of five watermarks through this decomposition is proposed. Some algorithms and examples are given to illustrate the main result.
